label: dog
caption: A beagle with a fluffy brown coat trots through the lush green grass of a backyard, its tail wagging excitedly as it sniffs at a patch of tall dandelions. The warm sunlight casts a gentle glow over the scene, illuminating the dog's joyful expression and the soft texture of the blades of grass beneath its paws. A few nearby trees provide shade, their leaves rustling softly in the breeze that carries the scent of fresh-cut grass through the air.
